<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and find its default VC toolchain. If &#96;VCToolsVersion&#96; is specified, that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a toolchain path. VS2017 and newer don&#39;t get added to the registry.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
